comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: foodora.no
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://foodora.no](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffoodora.no) ### Comment > App prompt on top on the frontpage. I propose `foodora.*##.show-banner". > > As I reported this from my phone, I couldn't search for script, and (sorry to say) using the report form on a phone is an absolute nightmare because the form kept resetting to step 1 when I opened another tab to take screenshots or to check enabled lists. comment.body:
It works well and I haven't noticed any problem till now.
But I prefer to use DNS-over-TLS service. No additional software needs to be installed.
